Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The woods south of Hammel road were very beautiful this morning.  Coverage is good, there are some fallen sticks (especially under the big pines) but easy to avoid.  Tracks are just skier made and pretty washed out, but all in all it's a nice ski with fresh light snow on top (and knock on wood, saw very little foot traffic).

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob red and blue loop has 18” of hard packed base . Looks like we will be skiing late into the Spring!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 chairlifts and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: We are having a real winter in Northern Michigan. The landscape is frozen and beautiful. The snow surface is machine groomed, the fresh snow from yesterday now tilled into the base. On these cold days with new snow the crystals are sharp and will make your skis feel slow on the snow, it's a good day to wax your equipment or drop it off at the Tune Center. The high temperature will be around 15 degrees. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Kielbasa sauerkraut is the soup of the day. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. We are proud to welcome the 70 plus ski club for their 40th annual gathering. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
